comment:
Mash Schedule
    Strike grains with 11.67 gal of water at 166 째F.
    Mash at 153.5 째F for 75 min.
    Mash out with 1.52 gal of water at 212 째F.
    Vorlauf and lauter 8.78 gal in your first runnings.
    Add 7.22 gal of sparge water at 168 째F.
    Vorlauf and lauter 7.22 gal in your second runnings.
    Your combined runnings should be 16 gal.

Gypsum (CaSO4):			4.4 g;	2.8 g
Epsom Salt (MgSO4):		3.3 g;	2.0 g
Baking Soda (NaHCO3):	2.3 g;	NONE
Calcium Chloride (CaCl2):	5.4 g;	3.4 g
